head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DI MAYO, ANTHONY J., SR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DI MAYO, ANTHONY J., SR.

block.p: Di MAYO-Anthony J., Sr., of Paramus, NJ, formerly of Rochelle Park, NJ, died Thursday, July 13th, 2000 at home. Beloved husband of Josephine (nee Napolitano). Devoted father of Patricia Feghhi of Paramus, NJ, Linda Juranich of Montvale, NJ, Anthony J. Di Mayo, Jr. of River Vale, NJ, Jeffery Di Mayo of Middleport, NY, and Richard Di Mayo of Ridgefield, NJ. Loving grandfather of 14 grandchildren. Dear brother of Ann Mikulak of Nesconset, LI, NY. Funeral services at 9:30 AM on Monday from Vander Plaat Memorial Home, S113 Farview Ave., Paramus, NJ and 10 AM Funeral Mass at Church of the Annunciation, Paramus. Interment George Washington Memorial Park, Paramus. Family will receive their friends Saturday and Sunday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM. In lieu of flowers, the family requests donations be made to Parkinson's Disease Foundation, William Black Medical Resarch Building, Columbia Presbyterian Medical Center, 650 West 168th Street, New York, NY 10031-9982.
